Articles.Content:
Hello everyone! I made a sandbox mode profile, and was messing around with pre-made ships. Here is something that happened with a spaceplane; it tried to fly.. And failed. Tell me what you think! ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

[http://www.dailymotion.com/video/x2sbvri](https://www.dailymotion.com/video/x2sbvri)
I don't see the problem here... Just don't use Physics Warp.![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)
the plane flew perfectly fine untill you physiscs warped, most of my planes cannot fly with physics warp either XD
I know that, that was the point. When I did phys warp, it looked funny. : P
